reviewText: Yet another series which the BBC were foolish to stop making.
This TV show is the best!!! It's just annoying trying to use these DVDs in the US because of the region issue :(

Incredibly realistic, interesting ethical scenarios, and an engaging plot.
Quite graphic at times. A definite must for fans of medical drama.

This series ranks in the top five television series ever produced. Excellent story. Well told with fine pacing.
High quality acting and crisp direction.
Fascinating at every level and a lasting after view equal to a very good wine.
I believe anyone who views this series will agree with my assessment.
Definitely worth each and every star.

this is the most explicit gut-wrenching series you will ever see or experience. Riveting non-stop action. A clear head and shoulders above ER and such usa series. the absolute best!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

this dvd is very good quality like a new.
